title: San Francisco Just Reversed Its Killer Robot Plan
description: The city’s board of supervisors has rolled back a controversial decision to let robots use lethal force without human intervention. But the fight is far from over.

title: A Row Erupts Over Texas’ Bold Bitcoin Battery Plan
description: Bitcoin miners say they can help stabilize a shaky power grid and prevent blackouts. Experts say it will make the problem worse.

title: Airbnb Is Running Riot in Small-Town America
description: The company sent cities scrambling to clamp down on short-term rentals. Now resort towns are feeling the pinch.

title: ChatGPT’s Most Charming Trick Is Also Its Biggest Flaw
description: The articulate new chatbot has won over the internet and shown how engaging conversational AI can be—even when it makes stuff up.
